articles.title: Manchester United predicted line-up vs Fulham as Jadon Sancho and Marcel Sabitzer start in FA Cup - Manchester Evening News
articles.description: Manchester United host Fulham in the FA Cup quarter-finals on Sunday
articles.content:
Manchester United can book themselves a second trip to Wembley this season by beating Fulham in the FA Cup quarter-final on Sunday.
